Posts.Content: marlynS wrote: Hi everyone I have recently diagnosed with sarcoma of Ovary and had my ovaries and the whole thing removed. I am going through chemo with Gemzar and taxotere. I am lost and can't not find anyone who has gone through this. Help.. god bless all of you .. hang in there..Â  Love Malena Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Anyone diagnozed with Sarcoma..help! marlynS KinAZ
